mem dc = img dc.createcompatibleDc()
screenshot =win32ui.createBitmap()
screenshot.CreatecompatibleBitmap(img dc, width, height)
mem dc.Selectobject(screenshot)

#截图至内存设备描述表
mem_dc.BitBlt((0,0),(width, height),img_dc,(0,0),win32con.SRCCOPY)
#将Bitmap数据转换为PIL Image对象并保存为JPEG
#首先创建一个BytesI0对象来接收位图数据
bmp data = screenshot.GetBitmapBits(True)
'raw','BGRX',0,1)
img = Image.frombuffer('RGB',(width, height), bmp data,
#保存为JPEG
img.save('.\\cache\\screenshot.jpg', 'JPEG')
#内存释放
mem dc.DeleteDc()
win32gui.Deleteobject(screenshot.GetHandle())
